name: tracey pooh
body:
Yay! We had 7 riders join us for a perfect sized storming of these 45 miles. 2 of the riders (one was another Training Ride Leader incognito) *whipped* though the course and finished a stunning 90 minutes before the rest of us.

Hunter and I each got a flat, at separate times, so we both wound up by the end being the sweeps. That was just fine since everyone made it though the entire route and everyone kept safe, phew!

Yay surreal climbing routes. I was really happy that a bunch of you commented to me how you enjoyed the strange sites and choice of the course!

Roll on!

name: tracey pooh
body:
Ride Stats:

9 riders (2 were leaders)
Finish times range: 3 hours, 10 minutes to 4 hours, 30 minutes
